title: Pelosi Says She Will Create Select Committee to Probe Jan. 6 Assault on U.S. Capitol
sub_head: In May, the House passed a bill to create a bipartisan commission to investigate, but Senate Republicans blocked the legislation
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”House Speaker Nancy Pelosi said Tuesday that she will create a select committee to probe the Jan. 6 assault on the U.S. Capitol, according to a person familiar with her remarks.
Mrs. Pelosi made the announcement to the House Steering and Policy Committee. In May, the House passed a bill to create a bipartisan, independent commission to investigate Jan. 6, but Senate Republicans blocked the legislation, preventing it from becoming law.
More to come.
Write to Lindsay Wise at lindsay.wise@wsj.com
